DOC.brief_summary: The study purpose is to examine the influence of INTERCOAT in prevention of intra-uterine adhesions formation after any hysteroscopic surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Efficiency of INTERCOAT (Oxiplex/AP Gel) in Preventing Intrauterine Adhesion Formation in Hysteroscopic Surgery
DOC.criteria: Age between 18 and 50 years Must be able to understand, read and sign consent form Signs of infection upon admission Ongoing pregnancy Carcinoma of the uterus or cervix Recurrent PID Women admitted for endometrial ablation Women that gave birth 6 weeks ago Women participating in another study
